article_title: Beach City officials 'blindsided' after police chief quits during meeting

article_metadata.description: Beach City Police Chief James Wood resigned abruptly Monday night during the village council meeting following a disagreement with members.
article_metadata.author: Christina McCune Independent staff writer

og.description: Beach City Police Chief James Wood resigned abruptly Monday night during the village council meeting following a disagreement with members.
